discussion_comments.comment_body: Why do we change from using the string "Value template" to "State"?

Because value template represents the state and will be migrated to state in a few months under the hood.  Switch was migrated to the UI before it was available in modern yaml config format so it never got the state option.  The config entry will change from value_template to state sometime around December when the migration is complete.  People using the UI don't need to know this is happening.

Here similar, when referring to "Probability threshold":

```suggestion
      "extreme_threshold_error": "'Probability threshold' set to 0% means that the sensor will always be 'on' and 100% mean it will always be 'off', use a close number like 0.1% or 99.9% instead",
```
